DataElement.preferredName: First Enrollment Patient Principal Investigator Study Confirmation Eligibility Determination Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator whether the site study principal investigator or designee confirmed eligibility of a patient who was the first to be enrolled at the site.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Enrollment Patient Principal Investigator Study Confirmation Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._Having been established or verified._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Principal Investigator Study Confirmation Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:Having been established or verified.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
